tool_description: A tool that allows users to search the front pages of websites on the internet, retrieving the title, description, and screenshot of the front page, along with additional information such as IAB category, size, language, and domain rank percentile.

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: This API function takes any search string in any language and returns relevant front page information.

required_parameters.name: pageno
required_parameters.description: The page number of the search results to retrieve.

required_parameters.name: country
required_parameters.description: The country code to filter the search results.

required_parameters.name: lang
required_parameters.description: The language code for the search query.

required_parameters.name: search
required_parameters.description: The search string to query the front pages.

optional_parameters.name: perpage
optional_parameters.description: The number of results to return per page.
